data.title: Heaven on Earth
data.text: rA has been my husband and my go to spa for the past 10 years now.  The service is top notch, the place is perfection for relaxing and I always leave cool, calm, and relaxed!

data.title: Good services
data.text: Love going here and trying out all of the products.  I especially enjoy the Tropical Vanilla sunscreen.

data.title: Pretty nice spa
data.text: I enjoyed my facial here but the women's changing area is tiny and awkward when someone else is in there. The staff is super accommodating. Fresh fruit is available everywhere and an added nice touch.  We took our own champagne and they brought it back to our waiting area iced down with chilled flutes. My friends were very happy with their massages.  The exfoliating oil used on me left my face burning and super red the next day but that may just be my reaction.

data.title: OK, but not a full spa experience
data.text: If you are looking for a full spa experience, with quiet lounges and places to relax before and after your massage ala Burke Williams, then this is not the spa to go to.  It is a very basic place to get a massage and then leave.  The changing room is a small room with lockers.  Not bad, but no a true relaxing establishment.  I did love the bath; however, you can only add on to a treatment, not purchase on its' own.

data.title: Pure Panpering
data.text: This Spa is so much more than it seems from the outside.  The rooms and interior are such a great surprise.   They have everything from fruit & drinks to private bathrooms.  Massages are wonderful.   A little expensive, but worth it.

data.title: I am a regular
data.text: I love this place and go as often as I can.  They are so sweet and really accommodating.  They are open late (till 10pm) and have deals all the time.  They have a sauna, great therapists, good products and the location is perfect.  I have had many girl dates starting with lunch and then spa treatments.  Be sure to check their web-site for deals!

data.title: A TREAT for the Soul
data.text:
My first time ever at a spa, and I have to say I will go back, next time I am visiting!  

I treated my daughter to a FACIAL, and the entire process was exactly what I had hoped; calm and relaxing, and since it was my first experience at a spa, my masseuse explained things in a quiet and assuring tone - I almost fell asleep!  

If you want to feel like a queen for an hour and better about yourself for a month, I suggest you indulge in the rA Organic Spa experience!  I bought my daughter a gift certificate so she can go back a few more times, on me!  I think we all deserve this, and my only wish is that I'd have gone sooner.  :)

data.title: The only place to go
data.text: I found this business on Yelp and decided to try it out and it's one of my favorite places to enjoy a little R n R.

data.title: Love this spa!
data.text: My and girlfriend and I have gone to this spa a few times and we just love it.  The spa is clean and relaxing and the massages are so good and so relaxing.  Would highly recommend this place.  Its a must go.

data.title: No complaints
data.text: I have been going to RA for the past 7 years and always enjoy the facility. Only one time I was unhappy with service and management made it up. I just visited last week and I had a great experience. I'm a happy customer.

data.title: Resorts Style Spa without the $$
data.text: Great, luxurious, highly professional staff tucked away in nice part of Burbank. I paid $110 for a great spa experience.

data.title: Many better spa choices than this one
data.text: I got a massage here and the massage was great...but the spa itself not so much. It's Very dark inside and that makes finding your way around difficult. No real dressing room to change in. No real comfy place to sit and wait for your treatment. It's a swing and a miss in my book - especially with The Langham in Pasadena near by with stunning grounds and everything you need in a spa - and Burke Williams is close as well.

data.title: Ahhhhh!
data.text: Looking for a daycation or a day of relaxing on vacation?  rA Organic Spa in Burbank is a delightful destination.  Leave your tensions behind as you are lead back into the interior resplendent with restful areas with food and drink, individual shower rooms and soothingly decorated massage rooms. The peace and quiet envelop you as your masseuse begins to do whichever of many offerings you have requested.  I enjoyed a Swedish Massage from Noel and it was a wonderful Mother's Day present!

data.title: Pure Relaxation
data.text:
Spent my birthday morning/afternoon at the spa.  Had the rA Bliss package which included:
1) Honey Drizzle Bath-Very relaxing, worth a try once
2) 1 hour customized facial-very nice and refreshing
3) 1 1/2 hour Deep Tissue Massage-Kate is phenomal! Pure relaxation and the best massage ever.
Facilities are very clean and relaxing. Staff very friendly. They offer showers with all the amenities to get ready to join the real world after your services. Definitely hope to be a repeat customer.

data.title: Couples Massage!
data.text:
Took my husband here for his birthday for a couples massage (haha I benefit!). 
Filled out the form online for an appointment and received an email confirmation pretty quickly. 

Shiatsu Therapy - 60 Minutes - $115/person

Street parking is 90 minutes free or there's a parking structure not too far away (just follow the signs for parking). 

The facility is actually a lot larger than I expected. When you check in at the front, it doesn't look very big, but when you walk through the doors, you realize it's a very LONG hallway (dark, quiet, calm....).
For the Shiatsu massage, they provide some over-sized tshirts and pants for you to wear. They have a changing area and some lockers for you to put your belongings. You get a key to your locker you can put on your wrist. In the waiting room, they had fruit and beverages for us. When they were ready for us, they took us to the room where they put had mattresses on the floor (this is the same room they do the Thai massages in).

I've been to 3 Spas recently, and this is the first one that really impressed me! Although their prices are a bit higher, I would definitely come back here again for another treatment. This was my husband's first professional massage and I think he was hurting after HAHAHA! "I didn't know little fingers could hurt me so much".
As for me,  I felt so much good after wards... ahh...

If you check-in, you get a deal for $15.00 off a 90 minute massage or facial!

data.title: Great Way to End a Trip to LA!
data.text: This is a really nice, relaxing spa! The staff is really friendly and they did a great job with the massage.  I got a Swedish massage and it was really nice! They have plenty of fresh fruit, hot tea, and relaxing areas to unwind.  I needed it after a hard weekend of partying in Burbank!

data.title: Best Massage
data.text: I sent my wife here and she said it was the best massage she ever had.  It looks small on the outside, however it is really nice on the inside

data.title: Great foot treatment
data.text:
Place is a heaven in Burbank downtown with an oriental feel. Great salt room to wait for your treatment.
Complimentary teas, water, fruits.

Great treatment by Nicole who saved my poor feet after so much traveling.

Would definitely come back for a longer treatment

data.title: HEAVEN ON EARTH
data.text: ...and I'm so glad it's in Burbank! I've had the Swedish massage with hot stones (the hot stones are amazing, I swear), 30-minute and 60-minute herbal foot treatment (which is almost a lie - it's so much more than just feet), as well as various waxing and facial services (why would anyone go anywhere else..). All spectacular.

data.title: Once again exceeded my expectations
data.text:
I've been going to rA on and off for a few years now and every time has been exceptional. It's located in downtown Burbank and from the outside it's hard to tell how beautiful the facilities are. Once you're inside, you'll be amazed at how large it actually is. 

This time around, my husband and I dropped by to see if they could accommodate a couples deep tissue massage at the last minute. At first they said the first available time slot was not until 8pm, but they were able to work some magic and were able to take us right away. 

We were put in a curtained off area of the thai massage room. No complaints here since we gave them no notice. The massage was wonderful and the therapist very attentive. I just wish I had asked them to turn down the a/c because half way through I started feeling cold. Turns out I was almost directly under an a/c vent. My husband thoroughly thoroughly enjoyed his massage. (I say 'thoroughly' twice to emphasize how much he loved it). 

Thank you rA for another fantastic massage!
